column4: how do I make firefox take up less space? the menubars and such are so much fatter than what they were on windows...
change screen resolution, fontsize or firefox theme
I don't want to change resolution, I've tried changing the font and it's the same theme I had on windows, just here it's taking up more space. Anyother suggetions?

no, I think it is a resolution of font problem. There are smaller alternative themes as well. If you really want a literal answer you can run Firefox in VNC with a virtual resolution that is higher, then shrink the image on the clientside to say 70%...
